amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to eliminate funding for Energy Department's Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for Energy Department's Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 287 (Roll no. 533).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 287 (Roll no. 533).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
